issue.title: [Python] Expose HDFS implementation for pyarrow.fs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7310](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7310). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's a C++ implementation for HDFS (see `arrow/filesystem/hdfs.h`) but it's not exposed from Python.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7310?focusedCommentId=16987923) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Because of the optional dependency I suppose we should expose it under pyarrow.hdfs, although it'd be nice to be available from pyarrow.fs.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7310?focusedCommentId=16994527) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Fixed in PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5990
